desc: BOU-CHIQUE offer free size, 'Made in Italy' clothing at affordable prices. We have beautiful clothes ranging from a size 8 to 32, footwear from a size 3 to 9.5 and fabulous accessories and gifts. Shop online, in our Sunderland store, at Alnwick Market or through our weekly Facebook Live video's.

layout.text: View our latest range in ‘New In’ Collection
